casebody.data:
Argued and submitted August 7, In the Matter of the Compensation of Craig L. Hiatt, Claimant. Craig L. HIATT, Petitioner, v. HALTON COMPANY, Respondent. (92-14383; CA A91194) 922 P2d 1279 Kenneth L. Kleinsmith argued the cause for respondent. With him on the brief was Meyers, Radler, Replogle & Bohy. PER CURIAM

reversed and remanded for reconsideration September 18, 1996

Donald E. Beer argued the cause for petitioner. With him on the brief was Popick & Merkel.

Before Warren, Presiding Judge, and Edmonds and Armstrong, Judges.
